Articles.Content:
Every time I try to run KSP, it crashes in the loading screen when the bar is about half way done. Can anyone help me with this problem? It's been very frustrating for the past week and I really want to play it. Thanks

Edited January 24, 2015 by GalaxiesFinestToday
We'll need to look at the crash logs. If you're not sure where they are, please see the stickied Stock Support thread.

i'd figure this might be useful as of your request.

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!
It doesn't look like that's the full log. If it's getting halfway through loading, there should be substantially more data.
It says i cant post that much characters. I have the entire report but its too long for the forum.
Please upload it to http://www.justpaste.it/ and post the link here.
Looks like you're running out of memory. Open up the settings.cfg file in Notepad and look for the TEXTURE_QUALITY line. Set this to 1 or 2, save the file, close it, and then start KSP again.
Well it crashed again. I ran it about 3 or 4 times to be sure, and sure enough it crashes. Is there anything else I can do? I really appreciate your help.
Hum... Could you upload a DxDiag file, please?

http://justpaste.it/j1zb There you go

- - - Updated - - -
